MicroClusterDecisionRule - Interface in br.ufu.facom.minas.core.decisionrule.microcluster
This interface represents the behavior of a decision rule used by MINAS to classify a micro-cluster.
MicroClusterDecisionRule_1 - Class in br.ufu.facom.minas.core.decisionrule.microcluster
Implementation of the MicroClusterDecisionRule interface that uses the TV1 strategy to calculate the threshold value for micro-cluster classification.
MicroClusterDecisionRule_1(double) - Constructor for class br.ufu.facom.minas.core.decisionrule.microcluster.MicroClusterDecisionRule_1
 
MicroClusterDecisionRule_2 - Class in br.ufu.facom.minas.core.decisionrule.microcluster
Implementation of the MicroClusterDecisionRule interface that uses the TV2 strategy to calculate the threshold value for micro-cluster classification.
MicroClusterDecisionRule_2(double) - Constructor for class br.ufu.facom.minas.core.decisionrule.microcluster.MicroClusterDecisionRule_2
 
MicroClusterDecisionRule_3 - Class in br.ufu.facom.minas.core.decisionrule.microcluster
Implementation of the MicroClusterDecisionRule interface that uses the TV3 strategy to calculate the threshold value for micro-cluster classification.
MicroClusterDecisionRule_3(double) - Constructor for class br.ufu.facom.minas.core.decisionrule.microcluster.MicroClusterDecisionRule_3
 
MicroClusterDecisionRule_4 - Class in br.ufu.facom.minas.core.decisionrule.microcluster
Implementation of the MicroClusterDecisionRule interface that sets the threshold value for micro-cluster classification as the sum of the standard deviation of the target micro-cluster and the micro-cluster that is closer to it.
MicroClusterDecisionRule_4() - Constructor for class br.ufu.facom.minas.core.decisionrule.microcluster.MicroClusterDecisionRule_4
